definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: Lark used dulcet singing offered wonderful performance for animals. The lion king was very happy.
sentences.chinese: 百灵鸟用婉转的歌声给动物们献上了精彩的演出。

sentences.english: Said the lark who just came over from behind.
sentences.chinese: 刚从他后面飞过头顶的百灵鸟说道。

sentences.english: The merry lark warbles in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那只快乐的百灵鸟在树林里鸣叫。

sentences.english: I can hear a lark somewhere begin to sing about it.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到，一只百灵鸟在某个高枝上，尽情地欢唱。

sentences.english: The lark said all this neatly, but seriously at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 百灵鸟认真而巧妙地道出了这些话。

sentences.english: It sounds like the singing of lark birds.
sentences.chinese: 这歌声就像百灵鸟一样清脆。

sentences.english: One day you cant carry a tune, now you sing like a lark.
sentences.chinese: 现在你唱得像百灵鸟，迟早有一天连调子都不会哼。

sentences.english: And the Lark was a nickname.
sentences.chinese: 而百灵鸟又只是一个别名。

sentences.english: When the lark in the sky sings joyfully.
sentences.chinese: 百灵鸟儿在空中欢快啁啾哟。

sentences.english: And her voice like a lark's song?
sentences.chinese: 她的声音就像百灵鸟唱歌？

sentences.english: If the sky were to fall, we could catch plenty of larks.
sentences.chinese: 如果天塌了下来，我们就可以捉到很多百灵鸟。

sentences.english: She was called the Lark in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 在那里，大家叫她百灵鸟。

sentences.english: Only the little lark never sang.
sentences.chinese: 不过这只百灵鸟从来不歌唱。

definition: cuckoo (Cercococcyx spp.)/same as 杜鵑鳥|杜鹃鸟[du4 juan1 niao3]
(bird species of China) oriental skylark (Alauda gulgula)
to sing at the top of one's voice (idiom)
(bird species of China) Eurasian skylark (Alauda arvensis)
(bird species of China) lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
